name: Eternal Fidelity
description:
Evil people set a bee on the king's daughters. The princesses, enlisting the support of the court knight, will be saved. The knight's vow will not allow him to retreat and he will save them all.

Eternal Fidelity is a Top Down game where you need to save the king's daughters. A bee launched by the conspirators should not sting the princesses. Try to beat it off with a shield and direct it at enemies. No princess will get hurt today.

Features of the game:
- Pixel-Art
- Pleasant music
- Complexity
